extendedInfo.description: ** Top 100 Medical Application in 27 countries **A very simple and easy to use app. to monitor your periods, determine the date of ovulation and the fertile period. My Menstrual Diary is a simple and easy to use yet comprehensive app. to monitor your periods. It also calculates the time of ovulation and your fertile period. Designed for Android Phones, this app. helps you plan your activities better. A lot of thought has gone into the process of making this app. simply useful and not too cumbersome to use. It is not overburdened with too many complicated features, making it difficult and confusing.  Whatâs New in this Update:1. There is a Personal Notes Window for you to write your health notes.2. You can switch off determining the ovulation date and the fertile period if you do not require this.The Features:â¢ You will be able to record your periods in the calendar. You can record whether you have spotting, light, moderate or heavy flow.â¢ Your next period will be highlighted based on the average interval of the last 3 periods.â¢ The day of ovulation and your fertile period for the month will be displayed so you can take the necessary action.â¢ All the previous periods, the duration and the interval will be displayed in the History Window.â¢ There is a brief description on what is a normal period, an abnormal period, how the calculation of the ovulation day is made and hence the fertile period. See the Notes Window.â¢ You can set a number of alerts:	o Alerting you from 3 days before your possible next period.	o Alerting you of the fertile period.    â¢ This app is password protectedPlease note that this application is based on the assumption that your periods are fairly regular. The date of your next period and the fertile period will not be accurate if you have very irregular periods.My Menstrual Diary is a very useful app. to monitor your periods.  It provides valuable information. However, it is not a substitute for professional medical advice.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: This is a very nice and good app  i like it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Recommend
reviews.comment: Been using this for couple months now n its predicted my menses accurately. Just wish it had a more modern design though  But all in all a good app
reviews.author: Kimberley Samuel

reviews.title: Great App!!!  Tracks menstrual cycles pretty good.
reviews.comment: Love this APP!!!! It\'s pretty accurate on when your next menstrual cycle will be.  A suggestion for young ladies is a way to keep track of when they have had sex & if possible, some way to  note whether it was safe sex.  They track this for Preg., medical & other reasons.  Just a thought/suggestion.  Thanks for the hard work & time for this APP & the updates!!  Great app!!
reviews.author: Heidi Ritchie

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Wish it added a had sex feature to save. Also wish it could save/backup to Gmail or something. Notes need to be easier to view. Otherwise great app
reviews.author: reckesia sellers

reviews.title: Greatest App
reviews.comment: I love this app. It is easy to use.
reviews.author: Tammy Reimer

reviews.title: Dates missing
reviews.comment: Some of the days on the calendar are missing. Not very helpful because of that. Otherwise,  it would be a good app. Uninstall!
reviews.author: Liana Sherwood

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: Great at keeping track when you\'re not wanting another baby.
reviews.author: Roxanne Johnson

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Awesome app. Helps a lot with planning things
reviews.author: ivyeria harris

reviews.title: Really good
reviews.comment: I love how it has a password because I don\'t have to worry about my brothers seeing it.
reviews.author: Skylar Whitaker

reviews.title: Um...
reviews.comment: It was really confusing! I couldn\'t edit the dates. :3 ~\316\240~
reviews.author: Elizabeth Luke

reviews.title: Samsung Galaksi Tab 7+
reviews.comment: Prediksinya akurat, mudah digunakan dan menarik
reviews.author: Neneng suharta

reviews.title: Good stuff
reviews.comment: Simple to use for calendar contaceptive, I use with coil as well
reviews.author: Lin Walker

reviews.title: Very Good
reviews.comment: It\'s Very Good & Accurate. I Love It :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but force close...
reviews.comment: Very nice n useful app but sometimes keeps force closing. Plz work on it.
reviews.author: Ruchi Goswami

reviews.title: Kristi_blue_eyes
reviews.comment: Love it, it was spot on for my first period, i have been irregular since January, i started the day it calculated, hoping i will conceive this month!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not great, but getting there...
reviews.comment: This is the first app I\'ve found that actually lets me record each day whether my blood flow is heavy, moderate, light, or spotting. Good. But stupid, it predicts ovulation dates on the calendar even though I uncheck ovulation alerts in the settings. I don\'t want that on the calendar since the predictions are WAY off, and all the little hearts are cluttering the calendar and removing my ability to see at a glance the record of my flow heaviness. Predicts ovulation even on days that I record heavy flow.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Simple and gets to the point.
reviews.author: A Google User
